intro: I'm excited to apply for the $position position at $applying_company. With over $total_exp_years years of experience, I specialize in data collection, organization, and analysis. My passion for presenting insightful projections and strategies to enhance business operations aligns with the tech industry's challenges.

closing: Thank you for considering my application. I'm eager to contribute my deep knowledge of databases and business operations to $applying_company. Feel free to contact me with any questions or to arrange an interview.
